channel.title: Games like RSC?
channel.description:
I'm looking for something nice like RSC.
List them up, don't mention RS2.

item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote author=The Enforcer link=topic=534439.msg3908372#msg3908372 date=1328458185]
-Nothing is 29 years old
[/quote]lol’d[/quote]
Oldschool/Nostalgic games are different story.

item.title: Games like RSC?
item.dc:creator: @The_Enforcer The Enforcer
item.description:
@The_Enforcer wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:19, topic:431735”][quote author=The Enforcer link=topic=534439.msg3908265#msg3908265 date=1328445116]

I started play Flyff now im at level 13 atm… I can’t stop haha! Its really fun, easy gameplay and good class build system.

Yeah everquest is epic. I’m going to try that private server

You serious? That ‘Flyff’ looks like shit. Only kids(or swedish) would play it.

But David is only 12, it’s ok considering his age.
[/quote]
Looks like shit? aye… Test it before you express yourself, bitch.
You’re funny though, while I’m three years older than you.[/quote]

-Nothing is 29 years old - if you’re 32 and play flyff it’s kind of strange.

Read full topic

item.title: Games like RSC?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:19, topic:431735”][quote author=The Enforcer link=topic=534439.msg3908265#msg3908265 date=1328445116]

I started play Flyff now im at level 13 atm… I can’t stop haha! Its really fun, easy gameplay and good class build system.

Yeah everquest is epic. I’m going to try that private server

You serious? That ‘Flyff’ looks like shit. Only kids(or swedish) would play it.

But David is only 12, it’s ok considering his age.
[/quote]
Looks like shit? aye… Test it before you express yourself, bitch.
You’re funny though, while I’m three years older than you.

Oh yea… There is like 10 servers online with 1000s of players in every world.
Most of them are from Finland, thailand & USA.[/quote]
Doesn’t seem like it, since you obviously can’t count.

It looks like shit and obviously, there’s 1000’s of kids in every world, most of the oldest players are swedish though.

Read full topic
